Directly supplied files
Start
Open the package explorer, right-click and choose "Export". In the wizard that pops up, choose "Autojar / Create archive".
You can select one or more Java projects before creating a new configuration. Those projects will be pre-selected as class path providers on the class path page. However, the setting may as well be entered or changed later.

Now click on "Next".
